Get DiAna reference

Source: R/DIANA_reference.R
DiAna_reference.Rd

This function provides the DiAna reference, that should be used when using DiAna.

Usage

DiAna_reference(print = TRUE)

Arguments

print

Logical, should the output be printed? Default to TRUE.

Value

DiAna reference

Examples

DiAna_reference()
#> [1] "To cite this package in your work and publications use:"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
#> [2] "Fusaroli M., Giunchi V. - DiAna version 2.1.0 (2025-02-06). An open-source toolkit for DIsproportionality ANAlysis and other pharmacovigilance investigations in the FAERS. https://github.com/fusarolimichele/DiAna_package; https://github.com/fusarolimichele/DiAna; https://osf.io/zqu89/."                           
#> [3] ""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
#> [4] "DiAna contributors for specific functions were: Zoffoli V. for helping developing the cleaning procedure for the FAERS, Van Holle L. for time to onset analysis (cfr. https://doi.org/10.1002/pds.3226), Sakai T. and Trinh N. for pregnancy algorithm (cfr. 10.3389/fphar.2022.1063625)"                                 
#> [5] ""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
#> [6] "Additional reference: Fusaroli M, Giunchi V, Battini V, Puligheddu S, Khouri C, Carnovale C, Raschi E, Poluzzi E. Enhancing Transparency in Defining Studied Drugs: The Open-Source Living DiAna Dictionary for Standardizing Drug Names in the FAERS. Drug Saf. 2024 Mar;47(3):271-284. doi: 10.1007/s40264-023-01391-4."
